title: Andrei Samorukov
text:
Andrei Nikolayevich Samorukov (; born 30 May 1970) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player. He is the goalkeepers' coach with the Under-20 squad of <a href="FC%20Lokomotiv%20Moscow">FC Lokomotiv Moscow</a>.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1987 for <a href="SK%20EShVSM%20Moscow">SK EShVSM Moscow</a>.
European club competitions.
With <a href="FC%20Rotor%20Volgograd">FC Rotor Volgograd</a>.
